body: I bought an optifine cape at 3:20pm eastern time, how long does it take to get it onto your account
body_tagged: I bought an optifine cape at 3:20pm eastern time, how long does it take to get it onto your account
title: Optifine cape question[resolved]

replies.body: I had to relog at first. It took me under 5 minutes.
replies.body_tagged: I had to relog at first. It took me under 5 minutes.

reply_to.body: I had to relog at first. It took me under 5 minutes.
reply_to.body_tagged: I had to relog at first. It took me under 5 minutes.

replies.body:
Go to this link and login. If you have a cape on your account it will work, if not then it won't. 

If it doesn't, you should check your payment and make sure you entered the correct username. Then contact Optifine with your issue. There isn't really much we can do here to help you with this issue.
replies.body_tagged:
Go to this link and login. If you have a cape on your account it will work, if not then it won't. 

If it doesn't, you should check your payment and make sure you entered the correct username. Then contact Optifine with your issue. There isn't really much we can do here to help you with this issue.

replies.body: nvm, got it :D figured out it needed to be activated, it wasn't taking my password for some reason, reset my password and activated it :D will keep this up for anyone who had the same problem ;3
replies.body_tagged: nvm, got it :D figured out it needed to be activated, it wasn't taking my password for some reason, reset my password and activated it :D will keep this up for anyone who had the same problem ;3

replies.body: Good to know you got it fixed, enjoy your cape!
replies.body_tagged: Good to know you got it fixed, enjoy your cape!
